messages.message:
a lot of these tests are failing on aihub-uat

are you planning to fix them for 25.08 UAT?

unfortunately, i cannot run Cypress tests on my laptop to try to fix

i just run into the issue described in this thread (https://github.com/cypress-io/cypress/issues/31072) (i think bc my laptop just upgraded to macOS 15.3?)

is anyone else seeing this issue when running `yarn run e2e:open`?
I ran into it once. I was able to solve it by: https://docs.cypress.io/app/references/troubleshooting#To-clear-App-Data

i get a white screen before i can go to step 2 (Go to `Developer Tools` -> `View App Data` ) :sob:

i worked around it by using cypress v14.0.0 locally - the test i'm running still seems to run properly? it fails at the same place as in CI / aihub-sandbox / aihub-uat at least :lolcry:

>  are you planning to fix them for 25.08 UAT?
Yes! That’s the plan.
Maybe this means we can safely upgrade to v14! :smirk_cat:

Haha perhaps!! I don’t want to make the change now though, let’s get cypress a little more stable first :lolcry: 

To be fair, most of the issues are backend issues, not bc the test is actually flaky or badly written
